alert.note: Alert for Tipton (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 05 at 4:54PM CDT until June 05 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Poinsett County in eastern Arkansas... Southwestern Mississippi County in eastern Arkansas... Northeastern Crittenden County in eastern Arkansas... Southwestern Tipton County in west Tennessee... * Until 545 PM CDT. * At 453 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Wilson, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Marked Tree, Wilson, Tyronza, Joiner, Dyess, Gilmore, Bassett, Marie, Turrell, Clarkedale, Birdsong, Whitton, Dimple, Deckerville, Evadale, Driver, Menesha, Golden Lake, Carson Lake and Dub. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
